title: Biomechanics of how the Ebola virus attaches to its host cell

title_detail.value: Biomechanics of how the Ebola virus attaches to its host cell

summary: Engineers and microbiologists have developed a simple model for virus-host cell interaction driven by Ebola's adhesion to cell surface receptors. The findings could provide new information to help develop effective antiviral treatments.

summary_detail.value: Engineers and microbiologists have developed a simple model for virus-host cell interaction driven by Ebola's adhesion to cell surface receptors. The findings could provide new information to help develop effective antiviral treatments.
